comments:
Build ID: I20061214-1445

Steps To Reproduce:
!ENTRY org.eclipse.team.cvs.core 2 0 2007-01-07 09:00:45.744
!MESSAGE CVS file /org.eclipse.ui.ide/src/org/eclipse/ui/internal/wizards/datatransfer/messages.properties either contains invalid line endings on the server (CR/LF instead of just LF) or is a binary file that is not marked as -kb.


More information:

Did you view the history of this file (or do some other CVS-type action) or do you just get this message on startup?  I have the ui.ide project loaded from CVS in my workspace, ran self-hosted, and did not get that message (using M4).  What hardware/OS are you using?  I am using WinXP.

Mac OS/X 10.4.8

Preferences:

General/Workspace

Text file encoding: UTF-8
New text file delimiter: Unix

Project is set to inherit settings from container (workspace) as in CVS.

Doing Team/Show History I get:
